song_name: this is what sadness feels like

verse
roses red and
violets lookin blue like me so poetic
so pathetic
to think i ever thought you’d be sympathetic

so dont call me a friend when youre not
so dont call me a friend when you’re not
so dont call me a friend when yourе not
